metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18751 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in GNU gettext 0.19.8. There is a double free in default_add_message in read-catalog.c, related to an invalid free in po_gram_parse in po-gram-gen.y, as demonstrated by lt-msgfmt.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

autopoint - 0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1
gettext - 0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1
gettext-base - 0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1
gettext-el - 0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1
libasprintf0v5 - 0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1
libgettextpo0 - 0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gettext package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.7-2ubuntu3.1').
